source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_200<tab>An overdweller...? Ba Go's beauties care not for overdwellers─no, no, not one bit. Ba Go suggests you go. Go before things get hot─fiery, blistery, hot.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_200ククク……あんた　だーれ？
ここには　何もないーよ……。
さっさと帰ったほうがいーよ　ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_000<tab>You seek something from Ba Go and his beauties? Hmmm? <var 1A 02 /var>Hmmmmmm<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_000ククク……。
ボクちゃんに　何の用なーの？

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_Q1_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A1_000_001<tab>What do you do here?
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A1_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A1_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A1_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_010<tab>You know not of Ba Go!? The greatest bombcrafting genius koboldkind has ever known!? You are fortunate that my beauties do not burn your face off for blasphemy─sacrilege, irreverence, blasphemy!
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_010ククク……ボクちゃんは「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」。
……そんなことよーり！
ボクちゃんの　カワイイ「ボムちゃん」のこと聞いてーよ！

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_011<tab>But Ba Go is merciful. Yes, Ba Go knows you are not to blame. No, no, your mind is simply too weak─feeble, frail, weak─to comprehend the scope of Ba Go's powers.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_011抜群のスタイルで　相手を悩殺すーる「10号」ちゃん……
普段はオトナしいけど　爆発するとスゴーい「31号」ちゃん……
「56号」ちゃんと「86号」ちゃんも　たまらなーい……ククク。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_012<tab>Ba Go forges gas and flame into blissful balls of boom─boom and doom! Where Ba Go's beauties go, death and destruction, destruction and devastation follow in their wake! Heehaha! Heahaehaheheaheah!
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_012ククク……ボムちゃんは　爆発するために生まれたーの。
死ぬために生まーれ　儚く消えーる　
一瞬のキラメキで　あらゆるモノを破壊すーる……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_013<tab>Is there anything, anything more beautiful in life than to burn with such passion─ardor, fervor, passion? Passion that consumes the self and all around it? No, no, Ba Go thinks not...
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_013ああ……なんーて　美しい存在なーの？
ボムちゃんは　ゲイジュツーよ……ゾクゾクするーね……
ククク……ククク……クククククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_020<tab>You stand within Ba Go's workshop of wonders, home to the most beautiful creations of alchemical genius you have ever had the fortune to behold─witness, gaze upon, behold.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_020ククク……ここは「第789洞穴団の採掘地」……
見てのとーり　なんもなーい
ヘンピな採掘地だーよ……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_021<tab>...Which is located within the 789th Order Dig, home to the dumbest, do-nothingest group of kobolds Ba Go has ever had the misfortune to meet.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_021採掘地っていってーも　硝石のカケラひとつ　採れなーい。
だかーら　ここにいるヤツーラは　みんなやる気なーし。
ここーはまさーに　コボルド族社会の最底辺……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_022<tab>But do you see Ba Go complain? No, no, you do not. For we have an agreement─a pact, a truce, an agreement. Ba Go makes booms for Gi Gu and his men, and in turn, they do not bother Ba Go.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_022そもそーも　ここにいる「第789洞穴団」は
あちこちのコボルド族の洞穴団から　追い出されーた
どうしょーもないヤツーラ　ばっかーり……ククク。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_023<tab>...Except when they <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> bother Ba Go. And when they do, Ba Go and his beauties make booms. The bothering soon stops afterward. Then everyone is happy─<var 1A 02 /var>especially<var 1A 01 /var> Ba Go! Haha! Heahahehaehaha!
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_023でーも　ボクちゃんは　結構ココ　気に入ってるんだーよ。
だーって……誰にもジャマされーず
大好きな　ボムちゃんの研究ができるかーら……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_100<tab>You return, yes, yes, you do. You would have words with Ba Go and his beauties?
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_100知ってるヤツがきーた。
どうしーた　ボクちゃんに　何かよーう？

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_Q2_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A2_000_001<tab>How fares the dig?
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A2_000_001<tab>近況について

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A2_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A2_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_A2_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_110<tab>Doings of small minds and grubby hands are of no interest, no, no, no interest to Ba Go.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_110ククク……いい加減に　ボクちゃんのこと覚えてーよ。
ボクちゃんは……そんなことよーり！
新しーい　カワイイ「ボムちゃん」のこと聞いてーよ！

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_111<tab>Ba Go's beauties burn brighter than ever. Yes, yes, they do, and this is enough for Ba Go. Isn't that right, my beauties─my dears, my lovelies, my beauties?
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_111さらーに　悩殺力を増しーた「真・10号」ちゃん……
普段からスゴくなーった「31号・改」ちゃん……
「極・56号」ちゃんと「86号・雅」ちゃんも……ククク。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_112<tab>Yesss, yesss...Ba Go's latest batch of beauties will make the biggest booms the realm has ever seen. Stick around for a while, and Ba Go will give you a show─a presentation, a performance, a show. Haha! Haeheaheahaha!
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_112相変わらーず　ボムちゃんを　創って暮らしているーよ。
……あとーは　少しだーけ　ほんの少しだーけ
みんなの鉱石掘りーを　手伝ってあげてるーよ……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_121<tab>You stand within Ba Go's workshop of wonders. These are the selfsame wonders that you, too, used to make many booms. Or do you not recall? Perhaps Ba Go's beauties also made your brains go boom? Hahehehaha!
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_121ククク……ここーは　ご存知「第789洞穴団の採掘地」……
見てのとーり　なんもなーい
ヘンピな採掘地だーよ……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_122<tab>Unfortunately, Ba Go's workshop still lies in the 789th Order Dig. Ba Go is afraid little digging is done at this dig─yes, yes, same as ever. However, the mouths that once mocked the 789th are now silent─quiet, hushed, silent.
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_122相変わらーず　硝石のカケラひとつ　採れなーい。
ここにいるヤツーラも　どうしょーもないクズ　ばっかーり。
ここーはまさーに　コボルド族社会の最底辺……ククク……。

source: TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_123<tab>Some give the credit to Gi Gu, but Ba Go and his beauties know better. Ba Go knows better, and so do you. Yesss, yesss you do!
target:
TEXT_REGSEADIGGING_00154_BAGO_000_123ククク……でも　あれかーら　みんーな
少しだーけ　ほんの少しだーけ　やる気だしーた……。
……誰かさんーの　おかげかーな？
